The 2024 Utah Democratic presidential primary took place on March 5, 2024, as part of the Democratic Party primaries for the 2024 presidential election. 34 delegates to the Democratic National Convention were allocated to presidential candidates. The contest was held on Super Tuesday alongside primaries in 14 other states and territories.
Biden won the primary in a landslide and received all 30 delegates.
Candidates
The following candidates were certified to appear on the ballot:
* Joe Biden
* Gabriel Cornejo
* Frank Lozada
* Dean Phillips
* Marianne Williamson
Results
